			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

courses and certifications</h3>  <ul class="clrFx">  <li class="item"> <p><a title="course1" 			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;

				  s.async = false;

				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);

var qsbModel = {
    autoCompleteURL   : 'https://suggest.naukri.com/suggest/autosuggest?',
    checkVersionURL : "https://suggest.naukri.com/suggest/v?",
    relatedConceptURL  : 'https://suggest.naukri.com/suggest/autoconcepts?',
    prefetchingURL  : 'https://suggest.naukri.com/suggest/prefetch?',
    maxHeight       : 388,
    multiSearch     : 1,
    maxSuggestions  : 15,
    startSearchAfter: 0,
    searchIcon      : 1,
    pskillCategory  : {skill:'Skills',title:'Designations',company:'Company'},
    formID          : 'qsbForm',
    appID           : 109,
    sourceID        : 109,
    cookieDomainName: '.naukri.com',

            qparams         : {'pFarea':18}
    };  

var suggParams = qsbModel;
  
</script>   </div> <div id="relatedSearch" class="wrap sugSearchItems"> </div> </div>  <link href="https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/c/resumeParser/p0widget_v3.min.css" rel="stylesheet" /> <div id="p0widget" class="flip-container "> <div class="flipper"> <div class="front"> <div class="registSec"> <input type="button" class="orangeBtn bifurLightBox" value="Register with us" bifurFormUrl="https://www.naukri.com/account/register/basicdetails" othersrcp="22528"> <div class="center_large_title">-or-</div> <div class="dspN"> <span id="dropArea_resumeParser"></span> <span id="results_resumeParser"></span> </div> <div id="uploadBtnCont" class="uploadBtnCont"> <input type="button" class="plainBtn" value="Upload your CV"> <input type="file" id="input_resumeParser" value="Post your CV"> <span class="disclaimer">Max 2MB, doc, docx, rtf, pdf</span> </div> <div class="center_large_title">We will create your profile</div> <div id="basicDetailLayer" class="ltBx wrappendInputs lightbox" rel="basicDetail"></div> <script>
			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

(function(w, d, s, l, i) {
       w[l] = w[l] || [];
       w[l].push({
           'gtm.start': new Date().getTime(),
           event: 'gtm.js'
       });
       var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
           j = d.createElement(s),
           dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
       j.async = true;

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

            googletag.defineSlot('/1268732/Naukri_Display/naukri_srp_web_bottom_970x250', [[970,90],[970,250],[728,90]], 'div-gpt-ad-1529415230769-2').addService(googletag.pubads());
    
    googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
    googletag.pubads()
          .setTargeting('Industry',[''])
          .setTargeting('Experience',['0.0'])
          .setTargeting('CTC',['0.0'])
          .setTargeting('FAREA',[''])
          .setTargeting('Search_Keywords',['cyber security'])
          .setTargeting('Location',[''])
    ;
    googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
    googletag.enableServices();
  });

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

			    //this function will work cross-browser for loading scripts asynchronously
				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
				window.addEventListener('load',function(){
					loadScript('https://static.naukimg.com/s/4/100/j/resumeParser/upload_v5.min.js');
				});

				function loadScript(src, callback){
				  var s,
				      r,
				      t;
				  r = false;
				  s = document.createElement('script');
				  s.type = 'text/javascript';
				  s.src = src;
				  /* Async false to execute scripts in order */
				  s.async = false;
				  t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				  t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
				}
